item.description: Cool way to start the New Year - Celebrate New Beginnings by opening the inner door to let the breeze of your spirit into your daily life. Experience the joy and peace that liberate you from the mundane and lift you into your higher consciousness. Set priorities for a new way of being in the world. Jyoti Meditators practice a simple meditation technique designed to help participants invert their attention to the spiritual realms.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the only group there.
item.name: Meditation for 2013 - Celebrate the New Year!
